meanings.sent1: The cute puppy at the shelter is very adoptable.
meanings.sent2: Many families are looking for adoptable pets to bring home.
meanings.sent3: The adoptable kitten tried to climb into the adoption paperwork.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was so adoptable that everyone wanted to be her friend.
meanings.sent5: The bright smile of the child made her even more adoptable to potential parents.

meanings.definition: Capable of being adopted or taken in.
meanings.sent1: The abandoned dog was so friendly and adoptable.
meanings.sent2: The orphaned child was considered very adoptable by the loving couple.
meanings.sent3: The adoptable idea of a new project excited the team.
meanings.sent4: Her adoptable attitude towards challenges made her a valuable team member.
meanings.sent5: The adoptable nature of the plant made it easy to cultivate in different environments.
